entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent warning code for array parameter passed to annotated location in ILLink/analyzer #96646
  • App using cached local storage sometimes after upgrading to .net8 #96644
  • ConfigurationBinder Source Generator is suppressing IL2026 and IL3050 diagnostics even when it doesn't actually intercept the call #96643
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'next != nullptr' #96642
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests` - `aot-instances.dll with exit code 137` #96631
  • Hitting OOM in LLVM for the wasi-wasm aot smoke tests #96630
  • [wasm][post-MVP] shared everything threads #96629
    Future
  • ManagedDelay_ConfigureAwait_True test failure in CI #96628
    9.0.0
  • "Unexpected end of archive" while unzipping test assets #96627
  • Possibly incorrect nullable annotation on IndexExpression.Update() #96626
  • JIT: Improper zero-trip checking in loop cloning/unrolling #96623
    9.0.0
  • TrimmerRootAssembly results in incoherent trimming and hence integrity check error #96620
  • Native memory leak on TLS client reading OCSP staple. #96616
    7.0.x
  • JIT: `fgRemoveBlock` does not maintain edge weights #96614
  • on AOT with Intercepter, Reflection(GetValue) for Virtual Property of zero value causes crush. #96611
    9.0.0
  • Decimal validation against XSD #96610
  • Are only AMD64 and I386 hosts supported for the Linux cross-architecture component? #96608
  • Test failure JIT/opt/OSR/synchronized/synchronized.cmd #96600
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690.cmd #96599
  • PGO: Multiple guesses for profiled casts #96598
    9.0.0
  • `HostResolverFactory.ResolveServiceProviderFactory` generates environment with incorrect `IHostEnvironment.ApplicationName` #96596

Closed

  • Use SearchValues<string> in Regex for single string searches #91644
    9.0.0
  • SerialPort is not supported on Mac Catalyst #75120
    Future
  • Is it possible to optimize Array.IndexOf(...) for Type? #95242
  • .NET 8, Windows x64 regression: Random (GC-related?) AVs in code constructing a large object graph from XML #94154
  • MarshalMode.ElementOut expects a ConvertToUnmanged function to exist #96564
    9.0.0
  • Unable to open https://source.dot.net/ because the certificate has expired. SEC_ERROR_EXPIRED_CERTIFICATE #96601
  • Vector128.LessThan broken for some UIntPtr values on mono #96443
  • Proposal: Add Support for Ad-hoc existential Types #12937
    Future
  • Discussion: ObjWriter in C# #77178
    9.0.0
  • AssemblyBuilderImpl.DefinePersistedAssembly has trouble with ReadOnlySpan methods #96469
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow specifying indent size and whitespace character when writing JSON with Utf8JsonWriter #63882
    9.0.0
  • Cast to nullable integer surprisingly fails on non-integers #96314
  • Test infra failure on iOS.Device.Aot.Test.WorkItemExecution CI leg #92792
    9.0.0
  • stackalloc is zeroed in prolog even if rarely-used #83629
    Future
  • Switches with intrinsic const aren't getting optimized #78356
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'OperIsSimple()' in pgo pipelines #96612
    9.0.0
  • Unable to run an MVC application using Docker Desktop #96355
  • [API Proposal]: JsonPolymorphic TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName Json Casing #96426
  • JsonSerializer constructor serialization does not ignore readonly properties #96408
  • .Net 6 API in failing at start up post this upgrade to VS2022 17.8. Getting error "Operation is not supported on this platform." #96507
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix last block removal during layout optimization #96649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use OriginalDefinition to get members of generic types #96648
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Create preheaders on new loops and delete old loop canonicalization #96647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add .NET 8 test project for System.Numerics.Tensors #96641
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Gen0 segment should always be reported as Gen0 for DacHeapWalker #96640
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix fast-path support for ignoring nullable value types #96639
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Fix XUnitLogChecker detection for local test runs #96638
    area-Infrastructure
  • Short diff summary #96637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #96634
    needs-area-label
  • Change IMarshallingGenerator resolution to use a sequential design instead of recursive #96632
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Hardware accelerated implementation of Quaternion multiply #96624
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Adjust genRangeCheck for handling integer length stored in 6… #96621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket thread affinity & server initiated close #96618
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Simplify `BasicBlock::CloneBlockState` #96617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Invalidate old loop table immediately #96613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow BBJ_COND false target to diverge from bbNext in layout optimization phase #96609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not limit InlineArrays on Native AOT #96607
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix endian issue in AssemblySaveILGeneratorTests #96606
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution

Merged

  • PGO: Enable profiled casts by default #96597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove extraneous use of unchecked from System.Linq #96622
    area-System.Linq
  • add SerialStream support for MacCatalyst #96492
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Fix typo #95569
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution
  • [browser] active issue 96628 #96635
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Replace LINQ's ArrayBuilder, LargeArrayBuilder, and SparseArrayBuilder with new SegmentedArrayBuilder #96570
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Allow specifying IndentCharacter and IndentSize when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #96139
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Fix a few more paths to in-tree emsdk #96625
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][amd64] Fix Vector128 relational comparison API's for nuint type #96515
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Fix generic signature issue when calling non generic method of closed generic type #96517
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [mono][jit] Optimize the experimental-gshared-mrgctx code #96104
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update Enumerable.Min/Max for all IBinaryIntegers #96605
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Revamp empty special-casing in LINQ #96602
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Fix OperIsSimple assert in lower #96615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing in wrappers for valuetypes with an explicit l… #96230
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Fix passing of valuetypes with a non-8 byte aligned size on arm64+ios/macos. #96079
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve performance of `Enumerable.ToDictionary()` #96574
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fix AggregateBy with seed to use correct helper #96603
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Simplify methodtable #96466
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove checks on loop number in fgCanCompactBlocks #96479
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0` PR #96459
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add test for GetInterfaces() array type #96589
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • NativeAOT implement warning as errors as a compiler feature #96567
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add debug-only use of new AssemblyBuilder.Save in Regex.CompileToAssembly #96462
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add osx RPATH in corehost #96367
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96261
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable activation injection for unix #95555
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log2 to Vector64/128/256/512 #96455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #95807
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #94582
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Avoid copy action for root assemblies #96363
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • STJ: set initial capacity of JsonObject if known (#96417) #96486
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP & WS #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #96388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize flips between 1 and 0 #95990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96578
    area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96577
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Adding osx-arm64 Mono Interpreter runtime tests job to extra-platforms #96023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Use pattern value in the summary for the generated regex method. #96488
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip after AOT compilation for library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement alternative for reachable block detection #2478

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for `$(TargetFrameworks)` per `$(RuntimeIdentifier)` (RID) #37830
  • [Workload Sets] ensure that users can get a full listing of all installed workloads (including multiple versions) #37828
  • NETSDK1206 and library projects #37826
  • UX when specifying a PublishProfile that does not exist. #37822

Closed

  • Containers: detection of port config should prefer ASPNETCORE_URLS #35845
    8.0.2xx
  • Container tooling doesn't understand the rtm channel #35647
  • TaskCanceledException: A task was canceled. hitting ctrl-c during container create #36593
  • Question: is there a way to get the CLR runtime info #37813

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable env var directives in the .NET CLI #37827
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove all sdks when switching branches #37824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #37782
    Servicing-approved
  • Add dotnet-format to the SDK repo #37717
    Area-Format
  • Include MSBuild version as part of --info, not every build. #37804
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822

PullRequests

Merged

  • Queue collections open issue #7827

Updated

  • Collection expressions: use iteration type for convertibility of element types #7783
  • Disallow method parameter conversion of `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` #7820
  • Update static-abstracts-in-interfaces.md to Fix Reference to Incorrect Type #7824

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nested 'for' semantic snippet fails to simplify global::System.Int32 to int #71542

Closed

  • Source generator does not produce the same result when compiled with dotnet or Visual Studio 2022 #71538
  • Collection expressions: conversion error reported for spread of `dynamic` type #69704
    17.9
  • Complete statement - fix semicolon placement on For statement initializer with missing semicolon #32250
    Next
  • Typing a semicolon inside a broken string in a parameter list inserts semicolon at the end of the method call #49929
    Next
  • Complete statement command enhancement #52299
    Next
  • Semantic snippets: postfix inline statement snippets are not shown if the next statement starts with a contextual keyword treated as identifier #69598
    17.8 P4
  • MSBuildWorkspaceLoader cannot access binlog (regression in dotnet/format tests) #70674
    17.9 P2
  • IDE0220 on foreach (Match m in regex.Matches) – Should Not Occur #63470
  • Unexpected error message from collection expression cast #71490
    17.10
  • Caret jumps to end of line when i type semicolon #37792
    Backlog
  • CS8509 Doesn't flag nullable enums correctly #71508
    Backlog
  • The type name 'Empty' does not exist in the type 'Guid' #71504
  • Short circuiting operations incorrectly converted to non-short circuiting version when reading from a ref #71487

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ILVerify bits #71544
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix unwrapping of null synchronization context during xunit test execution #71541
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Address UIDelays in AbstractGraphProvider.GetCommands #71540
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [PR VALIDATION] extend live table data source #71539
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support generic attributes in Attribute suffix simplification #71534
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Doc comment id cleanup #71533
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disallow `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` method parameter conversion #71531
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters

Merged

  • Fix issue where we were not offering 'use collection expression' in a nullable scenario. #71528
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Params Collections - Adjust binding in presence of dynamic arguments #71421
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Collection expressions: tests for spreads of dynamic and non-generic IEnumerable collections #71158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71543
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve Complete Statement behavior inside collection initializers and strings #71536
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71256
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Semantic snippets: fix inline statement snippets in a "qualified name" edge case #71246
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary WpfFact usage #71517
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • IDE0220 (foreach cast): Consider T of IEnumerable<T> for weakly-typed GetEnumerator #63472
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Update publishdata.json for VS snap #71537
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: report specific error (if any) for explicit cast failure #71492
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • README links #71535
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update other BCL to 8.0.0 #71516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to 8.0 #71507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve parsing performance with large collection expressions of numbers #71443
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move TestWorkspace to Workspace test layer, add EditorTestWorkspace to EditorFeatures layer #71407
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Use IHotReloadLogger service to log message whenever EnC is disabled #71385
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add error logging to RequestContext #71366
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Fix implementing abstract method with type parameter constaint on specific reference type #71287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't hard select promoted default item if there's filter text #71480
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Move editor-dependent tests to EditorFeatures #71518
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Break Solution-checksums into a checksums for pure-state vs source-generator state #71396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove string.Split calls during solution explorer search #71520
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for Partitioned Cookies #53224
    .NET 9 Planning
  • gRPC service fails when called from parent directory #53223
  • [Blazor] NPE in ExternalLogin.razor in the Blazor Web App with auth template #53221
  • Epic: Eventing Framework in .NET 9 #53219
    9.0.0
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #53218
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #53217
  • .NET 8 Blazor NavigationManager not always initialized when used in AuthorizationHandler #53216
  • [Blazor] Generate modern JS outputs that can be consumed by other JS toolchains (Blazor->JS) #53215
  • [Blazor] Modernize our Blazor JS assets and their delivery mechanism. #53214
  • FormFeature forces uploaded files to specify a filename directive in Content-Disposition header #53211
  • UseStatusCodePagesWithRedirects not working #53210
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #53207
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #53206
  • Blazor SSR using Iframe is not working #53205
  • Loading static assets from wwwroot folder returns 404 not found in Blazor8 #53204

Closed

  • Perf regression: updates #53203
  • Asset size limit warnings when building in CodeSpaces #47324
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Allow import of Blazor and DotNet JS objects from Blazor WASM startup script #48974
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Unify ViewBuffer logic between MVC and Blazor #49932
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Ensure ability to customize the HtmlEncoder used for the RazorComponentEndpoint #47477
    8.0.x
  • [StringLength] Attribute makes nullable string required in blazor #53179

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Locker GitHub action to only lock issues (not PRs) #53225
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Prevent NPE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [Infrastructure] [release/8.0] Update eslint js doc plugin #53220
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Accept an HTML encoder instance from DI if available #53213
    area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • fix: Added missing AddOptions() to AddLocalization. #53016
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Remove checked-in JS files #53209
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix duplicated place holder in log message #53009
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, community-contribution, 6.0.27
  • [Blazor] Accept an HTML encoder instance from DI if available #53140
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Centralize our JS build setup #53150
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Auto render mode improvements #53159
    area-blazor
  • Allow user to specify antiforgery request token source #51962
    community-contribution, feature-mvc-antiforgery, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Throw if resolving keyed service from non-keyed container #53051
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Dispatch inbound activity handlers in Blazor Web apps #53185
    area-blazor
  • Add polymorphic support to SignalR STJ #53035
    area-signalr
  • Always install node & build node components in CI #53154
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53157
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Support resolving MethodInfo from strongly-typed route handler delegate #53184
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • Add .NET Standard 2.0 TFM to WebUtilities and Headers #52801
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/6.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53158
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x
  • Enable gRPC tests on MacOS 12 #53186
    area-grpc
  • Use an image w/ node for SourceBuild #52969
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add null check for connectionId #52672
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Not working on Spesific versions #4449
    9.0.0

Closed

  • NativeAOT crash dumps bucket all user exceptions as APPLICATION_FAULT #4099
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView IsEnabled does not appear to work. #19768
  • Physical iPad Air 2 (Software Version 15.8) will not run new MAUI app #19764
  • Users require .NET 8 to be downloaded separately to run WinUI app #19763
  • [Android] ShellContent Visibility change leads to KeyNotFoundException: Microsoft.Maui.Controls.SetterSpecificity #19762
  • Documentation / feature request: global error handling #19761
  • Directory.GetCurrentDirectory() resturns C:\\Windows\\system32 #19760
  • апп #19759
  • Annoying exceptions when debugging (but which are swallowed at runtime) #19758
  • iOS App extensions with UseMauiEssentials=true don't bundle Microsoft.Maui.Essentials.dll #19756
  • [testing] GroupListViewHeaderIndexOutOfRangeTest test is failing on IOS #19755
    Backlog
  • [UITest] Investigate adding coordinate clicking to the Tap feature for catalyst #19754
    Backlog
  • Button with `Command` and `Style` does not behave properly when pointer hovers over the button #19752
    Backlog
  • Unable to set Button opacity on press. #19751
    Backlog
  • iOS 12.4.4 - ENTRY control | Arg_NullReferenceException | at TextFieldExtensions.GetClearButtonTintImage #19748
    Backlog
  • Shell BackButtonBehavior TextOverride property not working as expected #19747
    Backlog
  • Unable to connect to mac #19746
  • [iOS] Allow UpdateTabBarHidden method in ShellItemRenderer to be overridden #19745
    Backlog
  • WebView control not loading document from the local file storage #19743

Closed

  • [Testing] Replace uses of Wait with an implementation that fails when the condition is never true #19376
    Backlog
  • Unintended entry focus change in `ScrollView` #19733
    Backlog
  • Maui Splash Screen and AppIcon will not update on iOS App , #19732
  • IDE Issue regarding Hot Reload #19742
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 8.0.200 preview SDK installed, Error "NU3004: The package is not signed." for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Aspire.Manifest-8.0.100.8.0.0-preview.3.24054.2 happens when installing workloads. #19704
  • Title: hello issues #19717
  • Border is not displayed when inside a Frame in .net 8 #19726
  • I want to participate! I am going to be taking my first C# classes next week! Love where this is going! #19731

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Table name created by OwnsMany is better to be in plural form #32748
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite issue with multiple Blob colums #32747
  • Can't add migration for nested owned entities #32746
  • Order matters when configuring derived types with HashSet<int> in base type #32745
  • Short cut for Script-Migration the last migration #32744
  • Runtime Error in .NET8 App - Cannot Create DbSet for 'ApplicationUser' #32743
  • Left Join (GroupJoin-DefaultIfEmpty-SelectMany) will not be translated with ExpressionVisitor if no cache can hit #32742

PullRequests

Updated

  • Produce uncorrelated IN for Contains with nullable item #32575
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Cleanup when error occurs on dispose. #32605
    blocked
  • Handle updating complex type properties in ExecuteUpdate #32499

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 9 SDK installed, Some files are not identical in .exe installer and in .zip package. #17838

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #18140

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #18134
  • Cloak spectre.console's package.json file #18139
  • Remove unused properties #18117
  • Remove System.Drawing.Common workaround #18120
  • Set LatestCommit only for deployment-tools #18128
  • Remove dead properties #18129
  • Delete unused and non-functional Clean target #18131
  • Cloak spectre.console example file #18110
  • Add new .NET 9 NativeAOT runtime pack RIDs #18121
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #18107

Updated

  • Search through source looking for remaining 8.0 versions #18079
  • [NO MERGE] Installer (Merge to SDK) - Changeset #17959
    DO NOT MERGE
  • Update fedora image from 36 to 38 #17859
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #18112
    Servicing-approved, DO NOT MERGE
